item.title: Mega Man Rock Opera Update
item.description:
I recieved a reply from the Protomen this morning:

Sorry for the delay, things have been overwhelming.  As for your
question....

Merchandise
shirt - $8
CD - $10 (on backorder until 12/10)
shipping - $3 add to total

PAYPAL
If you are NOT using a credit card, send to
"deathcomestomatteson@yahoo.com".  If you are using a credit card, send to
"pumpkinhd1@aol.com".

NOT PAYPAL
Send a check or money order (checks may take an extra week to clear) to:
Joseph Ash
P.O. Box 66
Eagleville, TN  37060

do not hesitate with questions via e-mail.

thanks to you.

-P-

I’m ordering my copy of the album tonight. These guys deserve support for what they’ve done so I strongly encourage everyone to buy an album if they’ve enjoyed the samples. Consider it a donation to the artists.

Update to the update

Welcome Metafilterians. No, this isn’t a scam, atleast not on my end. If you’d like to get in touch with the artists yourself to confirm, send an email to theprotomen at hotmail dot com.
